queries.query:
from(bucket: "AirGradientBucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_gradient")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "Wifi Beats To Study To")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "2acb77")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "atmp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "AirGradientBucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_gradient")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "Wifi Beats To Study To")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "2acb77")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pm02")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "AirGradientBucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_gradient")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "Wifi Beats To Study To")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "2acb77")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "co2" or r["_field"] == "pm02")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "AirGradientBucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_gradient")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "Wifi Beats To Study To")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "2acb77")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rhum")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "AirGradientBucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_gradient")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["SSID"] == "Wifi Beats To Study To")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "2acb77")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "co2")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
